title.rendered: “IDF Reveals Name of Fallen Soldier, Updates on Wounded Reservists from Various Battalions in Gaza Battles”

content.rendered:
Attached is a message from the IDF Spokesperson regarding the name of an IDF fallen soldier whose announcement has been delivered to his family: https://IDFANC.activetrail.biz/ANC19012024928793730

Attached is a link to the IDF site, where details and pictures of the fallen are published and updated:
https://www.idf.il/59780

In addition, a reservist in Battalion 6646, ‘Foxes of the Heights’ (646), and a reservist in Battalion 7810, ‘Yiftach’ Brigade (11), were seriously wounded in various battles in central Gaza Strip.

Also, a reservist in Battalion 87, ‘Hammer’ Brigade (14), was seriously injured in a battle in the northern Gaza Strip.

The soldiers were evacuated for medical treatment in the hospital, their families have been updated.
